item.title: Haiku.py
item.description: Link: haiku.jillmunson.com no longer hosted on google app engine, currently migrating to AWS so stay tuned :) Github: haiku.py A work in progress JSON API haiku-as-a-service. Built with Flask on top of the provided sample application from CP:100, deployed on google app engine v.01 - Counting syllables with nltk and CMU pronouncing dictionary This all started as a demo app for google app engine that I was tweaking as part of CP:100, an introduction to Google Cloud Platform that was organized by GDG-NYC (side note: they are awesome and run some really awesome meetups so if you are in the area, go!
